name: Joshua D. Guttman
content: Joshua D. Guttman Joshua Guttman Research Professor, Computer Science email: firstname dot lastname at gmail.com Papers My publications are here. Report of the NSF Workshop on Security and Formal Methods The full report is posted on Arxiv at arXiv:1608.00678 [cs.CR] A four page executive summary is here. Courses CS 557: Software Security Analysis and Design. The course website is here CS 4536 and 536: Programming Languages. The course website is here CS 4401: Software Security Engineering The course website is here CS 559 and 564: Adv. Topics in Theoretical CS: Principles of Security and Trust The course website is here CS 2223: Algorithms The course website is here CS 521: Logic in Computer Science: The course website is here CSFW Older material Imps, an Interactive Mathematical Proof System (Home Page). I am grateful to the McMaster Computer Engineering Department for allowing us to maintain the Imps site on their server. Vlisp: A Verified Implementation of Scheme. This archive contains copies of three papers documenting the results of the Vlisp project. They made up Lisp and Symbolic Computation, volume 8 numbers 1/2 (1995), a special issue devoted to Vlisp. A related paper of Kelsey and Rees is also available here. Where's Joshua? The latest on my whereabouts. Joshua D. Guttman guttman at wpi.edu
